# Introduction {#intro}

Welcome to the intro to R workshop


In this book we cover basics of R
By the end of these workshops  c
reading data into data frames and some manipulation and graphing of the Data
We will be covering it in 3 sessions that are approximately 1:30 hours each.

This workshop is aimed at people who have some experience using programs such as Excel, or have done some basic coding in other languages. Visit the books github page to download the material. 


This book has been adapted from the Monash Data Fluency course. As it is aimed at a different audience we will be covering different material here.
